trans-unit.source: Provides members that you can use to interact with the SharePoint site that is associated with an <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNode" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 提供可用于与 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNode" /> 对象的关联 SharePoint 站点交互的成员。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNode.Context%2A> property of an <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNode> object to get an instance of this interface.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNode.Context%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNode>要获取此接口的实例对象。

trans-unit.source: The properties to create.
trans-unit.target: 要创建的属性。

trans-unit.source: Creates an object that has special type descriptor logic to expose the specified dictionary of property values.
trans-unit.target: 创建具有用于公开指定的属性值字典的特殊类型描述符逻辑的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object with the specified properties attached.
trans-unit.target: 附加指定属性的对象。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to display a set of read-only data as properties of a node in the **SharePoint Connections** hierarchy in **Server Explorer**.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此方法来为中的节点的属性显示只读数据的一组**SharePoint 连接**层次结构中的**服务器资源管理器**。

trans-unit.source: In an event handler for the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNodeEvents.NodePropertiesRequested> event, call this method to create an object that contains a set of read-only properties from a SharePoint site, and assign this object to the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.ExplorerNodePropertiesRequestedEventArgs.PropertySources%2A> property of the event arguments.
trans-unit.target: 中的事件处理程序<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNodeEvents.NodePropertiesRequested>事件，调用此方法以创建一个对象，包含一组只读属性从 SharePoint 站点，并将分配到此对象<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.ExplorerNodePropertiesRequestedEventArgs.PropertySources%2A>事件自变量的属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Extending the SharePoint Connections Node in Server Explorer](/visualstudio/sharepoint/extending-the-sharepoint-connections-node-in-server-explorer.md) and [Walkthrough: Extending Server Explorer to Display Web Parts](/visualstudio/sharepoint/walkthrough-extending-server-explorer-to-display-web-parts.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[扩展服务器资源管理器中的 SharePoint 连接节点](/visualstudio/sharepoint/extending-the-sharepoint-connections-node-in-server-explorer.md)和[演练： 扩展服务器资源管理器显示 Web 部件](/visualstudio/sharepoint/walkthrough-extending-server-explorer-to-display-web-parts.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointConnection" /> object that you can use to execute commands that call into the SharePoint server object model.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointConnection" /> 对象，该对象可用于执行调入 SharePoint 服务器对象模型的命令。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointConnection" /> object that you can use to execute commands that call into the SharePoint server object model.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointConnection" />对象，你可以使用执行的命令该调入 SharePoint 服务器对象模型。

trans-unit.source: For more information about calling into the SharePoint server object model, see [Calling into the SharePoint Object Models](/visualstudio/sharepoint/calling-into-the-sharepoint-object-models.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关调入 SharePoint 服务器对象模型的详细信息，请参阅[调入 SharePoint 对象模型](/visualstudio/sharepoint/calling-into-the-sharepoint-object-models.md)。

trans-unit.source: The message text.
trans-unit.target: 消息文本。

trans-unit.source: The buttons to display in the message box.
trans-unit.target: 要在消息框中显示的按钮。

trans-unit.source: The icon to display in the message box.
trans-unit.target: 要在消息框中显示的图标。

trans-unit.source: Displays a message box.
trans-unit.target: 显示消息框。

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies which button the user clicked in the message box.
trans-unit.target: 指定用户单击了消息框中哪个按钮的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the ID of the SharePoint site (<c>Microsoft.SharePoint.SPWeb</c>) that this node is associated with.
trans-unit.target: 获取此节点关联的 SharePoint 站点 (<c>Microsoft.SharePoint.SPWeb</c>) 的 ID。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the SharePoint site (<c>Microsoft.SharePoint.SPWeb</c>) that this node is associated with.
trans-unit.target: SharePoint 站点的 ID (<c>Microsoft.SharePoint.SPWeb</c>) 此节点相关联。

trans-unit.source: Gets the URL of the SharePoint site (<c>Microsoft.SharePoint.SPWeb</c>) that this node is associated with.
trans-unit.target: 获取此节点关联的 SharePoint 站点 (<c>Microsoft.SharePoint.SPWeb</c>) 的 URL。

trans-unit.source: A value representing the URL of the SharePoint site.
trans-unit.target: 表示 SharePoint 站点的 URL 的值。
